name: Goblins: Rise of Gurg
description:
You play as goblins attempting to bring about the rise of Gurg.

Warning: This game is incomplete. It is playable but various clues about locations are missing. It is possible to complete the goal of the game.

This game uses Bt Builder which is am open source implementation of the Bard's Tale Construction Set. The controls are similar to the Bard's Tale games. Arrow keys move. 'N' changes party order. '?' shows the automap. In combat or shops, the first letter of the option selects that option. '1' through '7' brings up that character slot. 'T' brings up the task list.

Spell codes are not listed in the UI. You need to look at the list in the readme.
